matter module¶

The location module provides the interface to the locations. A location is any point on the coordinate system of the simulators world

class matter.matter(world, x, y, color=1, alpha=1, type=None, mm_limit=False, mm_size=0)[source]¶

Bases: object

In the classe location all the methods for the characterstic of a location is included

write_memory(data)[source]¶

Write on its own memory a data with a keywoard

Parameters:
  • key – A string keyword for orderring the data into the memory
  • data – The data that should be stored into the memory
Returns:

True: Successful written into the memory; False: Unsuccessful
